client_review: I love The Golden Style Salon!! Not only is their work absolutely flawless and stunning, but their uplifting personalities and customer service are truly one of a kind!
I'm very pleased with this salon. They provide great customer service. When they give you an appointment they make sure they are ready when you arrive.
I just wanted to thank The Golden Style team for doing such a great job on my engagement day. Thank you for making my day extra special with your magic hands.
